        public Eraser(int thickness,

        Construct an Eraser object.

        isFill - if eraser is filled or not.

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Point p)
        If a certain click is within an eraser object. Returns false because eraser objects can't be moved by clicking on them.
        Overrides:
        contains in class Squiggle
        Parameters:
        p - Point that is checked to bee in this shape.
        Returns:
        if the Point is in shape or not.

      • isOnTopOf

        public boolean isOnTopOf(Shape s)
        Checks if a given shape is within the boundaries of this eraser object.
        Parameters:
        s - Shape object that is checked to see if it is on this eraser.
        Returns:
        the boolean dictate if this eraser is on the shape or not.
